abstract: Leon Nathan Davis of Georgia is charged in federal court in Augusta with attempting to provide material support to a terrorist group, accused of seeking to aid Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: Leon Nathan Davis has been charged in federal court with trying to aid the Islamic State, also known as ISIS.

headline.main: Georgia: Man Charged With Trying to Aid ISIS
headline.print_headline: Georgia: Man Charged With Trying to Aid Isis
